entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning late in the morning then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
